prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a handsome young man, intense determined blue eyes, medium-length, layered, spiky lavender colored hair, wearing a worn denim capsule corp jacket, leather sword strap across chest, battle-worn face
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, volumetric rim lighting, hyperdetailed skin texture, subtle weathering on face and skin, highly detailed texture on denim and leather materials, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, flat color, low quality, blurry details, blurry denim
